name: You Got Served: A Fist To The Face
name_original: You Got Served: A Fist To The Face
description:
Test your reflexes in this twitchy bar room brawl. How many adversaries can you take down before getting overwhelmed?

Use the left and right arrow keys to attack the enemies on either side of you as they get within range. Successful attacks allow you to keep moving quickly while misses will cost you.

Press the Escape key to close the game.

This game was created with the FlatRedBall game engine www.flatredball.com
